address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

did.abstract: Collection includes: 1 blueline photocopy rendering and 3 plans on 4 sheets for the proposed restoration of the Ox Barn Museum in Aurora, Oregon, scale 1/4" : 1 to 1/8" : 1", 1965. George A. McMath (1931-2007) was a Portland architect who is considered to be the father of the city's architectural preservation movement.

bioghist.p: George A. McMath (1931-2007) was a Portland architect who is considered to be the father of the city's architectural preservation movement.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: 1 blueline photocopy rendering and 3 plans on 4 sheets for the proposed restoration of the Ox Barn Museum in Aurora, Oregon, scale 1/4" : 1 to 1/8" : 1", 1965.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Ox Barn Museum Restoration Plans, Mss 3003, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
